32 inline void set_global_output_level(severity_level lvl)
33 {

42 inline auto simple_formatter()
43 {
44  using namespace boost::log;
45  return expressions::stream
46  << expressions::format_date_time<boost::posix_time::ptime>("TimeStamp", "%H:%M:%S.%f")
47  << " [" << std::left << std::setw(7) << severity << "] "
48  << expressions::smessage;
49 }

61 inline void setup_simple_console_logging()
62 {
63  boost::log::add_common_attributes();
64  const auto sink = boost::log::add_console_log();
65  sink->set_formatter(simple_formatter());
66 }
